Keyboard shortcuts for Obsidian

A visual cheat-sheet for the 17 keyboard shortcuts found in the Obsidian knowledge base app.

Original Reference Report Issue

Default Shortcuts

Save a file in the editor

  • Ctrl
  • S

Create a new note

  • Ctrl
  • N

Open the command palette

  • Ctrl
  • P

Open the quick switcher

  • Ctrl
  • O

Search in all files

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • F

Open the graph view

  • Ctrl
  • G

Navigate backwards

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • Left

Navigate forwards

  • Ctrl
  • Alt
  • Right

Search the current file

  • Ctrl
  • F

Toggle edit or preview mode

  • Ctrl
  • E

Open settings

  • Ctrl
  • ,

Editing

Bold selected text

  • Ctrl
  • B

Italic selected text

  • Ctrl
  • I

Insert an external link

  • Ctrl
  • K

Indent

  • Ctrl
  • ]

Unindent

  • Ctrl
  • [

Jump into the selected backlink

  • Alt
  • Enter
